quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易将其混淆为形近词"unintelligent"（不聪明的），或通过词根"intellectual"（聪明的）错误推导为"不聪明的"，忽略其"非智力的、不涉及理性思考"的核心义。
quiz_item.sentence: Sarah finds reading philosophy too demanding, so she often turns to **unintellectual** pastimes like binge-watching reality shows or playing casual games.

option.definition: 非智力的；不涉及理性思考的
